topic.title: Review
topic.section:
Review Policy. Conference's review policy is outlined for readers and authors and will appear on About page.

Peer Review. Review guidelines are specified for reviewers, and the peer review's system can be configured such as email reminder, reviewing time limit, "one-click" review access that directs reviewers to OCS by the link contained in the email, and directors' rating of reviewers.

Director Decision. This is to determine if the notification email go to all co-authors or to the submitter only.
